professional_summary: Machine Learning Engineer with 3+ years designing and deploying production ML systems. Expert in LLM-powered applications, transformer-based models, and scalable inference pipelines. Proven track record reducing infrastructure costs by 35% while processing 1M+ items daily. Strong Python, SQL, and Google Cloud ML experience with MLOps best practices.

work_experience.title: AI Engineer
bullets: Engineered AI system for processing and understanding large legal documents using modern LLM and transformer-based techniques
Developed document parsing engine and RAG-based Q&A system, reducing manual review time by leveraging retrieval-augmented generation
Implemented and compared RAG approaches including Google Vertex AI integration and custom systems with Qdrant vector database

work_experience.title: Co-Founder & CTO
bullets: Architected NVIDIA Triton-based ML inference pipeline processing 1,000+ items/sec with <100ms latency, reducing infrastructure costs by 35%
Engineered LLM and DSPy-powered data extraction pipeline with intelligent content hashing, increasing accuracy by 40%
Built distributed news processing system with RabbitMQ handling 500K+ articles daily with 99.5% uptime
Deployed comprehensive observability stack with Prometheus and Grafana, maintaining 99.9% system uptime

work_experience.title: Research & Development Intern
bullets: Developed CAN Bus programming solutions for automotive systems using embedded systems
